revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=EX6150 |revision=v1 |series=AC1200 |asin= |fcc_date=01/15/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U12H318 |manuf_rev=T00 |type=range extender |fcc_id=PY314300283 |ic_id=4054A-14300283 |pcb_id=U12H318T00 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.2 |pwr_conn=AC (direct) |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621ST |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12835F |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7612E;MEDIATEK, MT7612EN, 1416-BMAL, DTP06K65; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7603EN |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |flags=DFS (master), DFS (slave), |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''867'''Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1200 WiFi Range Extender}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-range-extenders/EX6150.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=EX6150}} "U12H318 801780 GP REV.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :OEM: [[Foxconn]] U12H318. Radio chip IDs are not clear. The MT7603EN is a guess based on similar devices of the time with a MT7621ST CPU. :DFS was added in a Class II Permissive Change on 11/30/2015 *Web GUI: http://www.mywifiext.net ===Firmware=== *[https://github.com/openwrt/openwrt/commit/3f019bf96cdf52668750f67cb139fa1b5c538f0b ''ramips: add Netgear EX6150'' on '''OpenWrt''' GitHub] ([https://github.com/openwrt/openwrt/blob/3f019bf96cdf52668750f67cb139fa1b5c538f0b/target/linux/ramips/image/mt7621.mk MT7621]) 
  Device/netgear_ex6150
  DTS := EX6150
  DEVICE_TITLE := Netgear EX6150
  DEVICE_PACKAGES := kmod-mt76x2 wpad-basic
  NETGEAR_BOARD_ID := U12H318T00_NETGEAR

SoC:   MediaTek MT7621
RAM:   64M (Winbond W9751G6KB-25)
FLASH: 16MB (Macronix MX25L12835F)
WiFi:  MediaTek MT7662E bgn 2SS
WiFi:  MediaTek MT7662E nac 2SS
BTN:   ON/OFF - Reset - WPS - AP/Extender toggle
LED:    - Arrow Right (blue)
        - Arrow Left (blue)
        - WiFi 1 (red/green)
        - WiFi 2 (red/green)
        - Power (green/amber)
        - WPS (Green)
UART:  UART is present as Pads on the backside of the PCB.
       They are located on the other side of the Ethernet port.
       3.3V - GND - TX - RX / 57600-8N1
       3.3V is the nearest one to the antenna connectors
===See also=== *[[Netgear EX6100]] *[[Netgear EX6110]] *[[Netgear EX6120]] *[[Netgear EX6150]] *[[Netgear EX6200]] *[[Netgear EX6250]] *[[Netgear EX6400]] *[[Netgear R6220]] • [https://github.com/openwrt/openwrt/blob/3f019bf96cdf52668750f67cb139fa1b5c538f0b/target/linux/ramips/image/mt7621.mk MTK] *[[Netgear R6230]] *[[Netgear R6260]] *[[Netgear R6350]] • [https://github.com/openwrt/openwrt/blob/3f019bf96cdf52668750f67cb139fa1b5c538f0b/target/linux/ramips/image/mt7621.mk MTK] *[[Netgear R6850]] __NOTOC__
